languages.text: "Надлежащая кара настигнет его, сержант. Не сомневайся".

traits.locale_text: "Надлежащая кара настигнет его, сержант. Не сомневайся".

languages.text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."
languages.original_text: "Надлежащая кара настигнет его, сержант. Не сомневайся".

traits.locale_text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."
"He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."
"He will be dealt due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."
"He will be dealt due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."
"He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."
"He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."

languages.text: 「軍曹、彼には相応の罰を与えてやる。必ずだ」
languages.original_text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."

traits.locale_text: 「軍曹、彼には相応の罰を与えてやる。必ずだ」

languages.text: “他一定会得到应有的惩罚，军士，我向你保证。”
languages.original_text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."

traits.locale_text: “他一定会得到应有的惩罚，军士，我向你保证。”

languages.text: «Recibirá su merecido, sargento. Puede confiar en ello».
languages.original_text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."

traits.locale_text: «Recibirá el castigo que merece, sargento. Puede confiar en ello».

languages.text: "Er wird seine gerechte Strafe erhalten, Sergeant. Darauf könnt Ihr Gift nehmen."
languages.original_text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."

traits.locale_text: "Er wird gebührend bestraft, Sergeant. Darauf könnt Ihr Gift nehmen."

languages.text: « Il recevra le châtiment qu'il mérite, sergent. Je vous le garantis. »
languages.original_text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."

traits.locale_text: « Il recevra le châtiment qu'il mérite, sergent. Je vous le garantis. »

languages.text: "Vakti çoktan gelen, cezasını çekecek Çavuş. Bundan emin olabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "He will receive his due punishment, Sergeant. You can be certain of that."

traits.locale_text: "Vakti çoktan gelen cezasını çekecek Çavuş. Bundan emin olabilirsin."
